SEARCH
Package com.dua3.meja.io

Class HtmlWorkbookWriter

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.meja.io.HtmlWorkbookWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
WorkbookWriter
public final class HtmlWorkbookWriter extends Object implements WorkbookWriter
HtmlWorkbookWriter is a class that implements the WorkbookWriter interface. It is used to write a workbook as HTML.

      public void setOptions(com.dua3.utility.options.Arguments options)
      Description copied from interface: WorkbookWriter
      Sets the options for the method. This method ignores the passed options; it is meant as a default implementation for Writer implementations that don't take options.

    • exportSingleSheet

      public void exportSingleSheet(Formatter fmt, Sheet sheet)
      Exports a single sheet as HTML. The exported content includes the sheet's HTML representation, CSS styles, and footer, ensuring proper formatting of the sheet in a web-compatible format.
      Parameters:
      fmt - the Formatter to write the HTML output to
      sheet - the sheet to be exported as HTML

    • exportSingleSheetWithoutHtmlHeader

      public void exportSingleSheetWithoutHtmlHeader(Formatter fmt, Sheet sheet)
      Exports a single sheet as HTML without including the HTML header and body tags. This method is designed for scenarios where the HTML header and body structure are managed externally or not required.
      Parameters:
      fmt - the Formatter used to write the HTML output
      sheet - the sheet to export as HTML

    • exportSheets

      public void exportSheets(Formatter fmt, Workbook workbook, Predicate<Sheet> predicate)
      Exports selected sheets from a workbook to an HTML format. The exported content includes the sheets' HTML representation, CSS styles, and footer, ensuring proper formatting for web display. Only sheets accepted by the given predicate will be exported.
      Parameters:
      fmt - the Formatter to write the HTML output to
      workbook - the workbook containing the sheets to export
      predicate - a Predicate used to filter which sheets to export
